column5: i noticed that the oe has not been transformed into œ in coeur (cœur), etc. as i thought it was,
column6: then i checked in the Burnouf, and there it has been changed. There are some exceptions to that writing (very rare) which i did previously communicate to you, i supposed when you did change the Burnouf dict. You could please find the email and change it also in Stoupak dict.
